Package edu.slu.prog2

Class Fraction

java.lang.Object
edu.slu.prog2.Fraction
Direct Known Subclasses:
MixedFraction
public class Fraction
extends java.lang.Object
This class enables the manipulation of fraction input such as adding or subtracting fractions.
Author:
Natividad, Hudson Kit P. and Calica, Gwyneth M.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Fraction()
    Constructs a fraction with a fixed value for the numerator (0) and the denominator (1)
    Fraction​(int wholeNumVal)
    Constructs a fraction with a fixed value for the denominator (1) but with a given numerator.
    Fraction​(int numerator, int denominator)
    Constructs a fraction with a given numerator and denominator.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Fraction add​(Fraction other)
    Adds fraction with another fraction.
    Fraction divideBy​(Fraction other)
    Divides fraction with another fraction.
    int getDenominator()
    Gets the denominator of the given fraction
    int getNumerator()
    Gets the numerator of the given fraction.
    Fraction multiplyBy​(Fraction other)
    Multiplies fraction with another fraction.
    void reduce()
    Reduces fraction to its simplest form
    void setDenominator​(int denom)
    Changes the denominator of the given fraction.
    void setNumerator​(int numerator)
    Changes the numerator of the given fraction.
    Fraction subtract​(Fraction other)
    Subtracts fraction with another fraction.
    double toDouble()
    Converts integer output of fraction to double output
    java.lang.String toString()
    Converts integer output of fraction to printable String output.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
